name: I am happy
description:
"I am happy" is an action- & narrative-packed roguelike game which takes place within the mind of a girl, who is fighting with her inner demons created by toxic relationships, self-doubt and the ghosts of the past. Throughout the game you shall dive into her psyche, figure out her troubles and hopefully help her overcome her negative emotions and mental issues.

This game prototype is developed within our Master Study of Games.

We would be delighted if you would fill out the following survey after playing our game, feedback helps us a great time to improve our game:

https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLScIDMGydJDn0O2ghsYIslDxynK7WsmytFCkHUTA...

Thank you <3
